title: Riot Merch Store - Amazing, but spensive!
body:
Well that just let me finish my Christmas shopping!
My friends can expect a Corki Hat and a Rammus Poro Plushie, and I picked myself up a Teemo hat finally!

Love it Riot!

Now if only you could bring more reasonable priced hoodies..... $96 is a big stretch for a lot of players.
Any real reason for the price of the hoodies other than the fact that people will buy them for that much? (I personally refuse as I find it completely ridiculous that it can be justified $96 for a hoodie...)

If someone could give me a reason as to why it is acceptable that a jacket can cost $90+ I'd love to hear it.

TL;DR Bought hats for friends + Poro but refuse to buy a hoodie for that RIDICULOUS price.
